docs.snippet: LEAD: Sidney Poitier, the black actor who played a leading role in breaking Hollywood's color barrier in the 1950's and went on to become one of America's most popular stars of the late 60's, was honored by the American Museum of the Moving Image ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Sidney Poitier, the black actor who played a leading role in breaking Hollywood's color barrier in the 1950's and went on to become one of America's most popular stars of the late 60's, was honored by the American Museum of the Moving Image last night in a gala ceremony at the Waldorf-Astoria.

headline.main: Poitier Honored by Museum of the Moving Image

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: AMERICAN MUSEUM OF THE MOVING IMAGE

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Baseball BALTIMORE (AL) - Signed Jeff Ballard, Gregg Olson, Bob Milacki, Pete Harnisch and Mike Smith, pitchers; Pete Stanicek, infielder, and Keith Hughes, outfielder, to one-year contracts. BOSTON (AL) - Agreed to terms with Rob Murphy and Steve Ellsworth, pitchers, on one-year contracts.

docs.snippet: For any child who ever fell in love with the Broadway musical, there was always that incredible moment of looking up to see the bright marquees of Times Square for the first time. I had always assumed it was an unrepeatable thrill until I saw the ...
docs.lead_paragraph: For any child who ever fell in love with the Broadway musical, there was always that incredible moment of looking up to see the bright marquees of Times Square for the first time. I had always assumed it was an unrepeatable thrill until I saw the show that Jerome Robbins officially unveiled at the Imperial Theater last night.

headline.main: Review/Theater; From Jerome Robbins, 20 Years of Broadway the Way It Was

docs.snippet: LEAD: ''This year we are celebrating life,'' Denise Tredwell of Brewster, N.Y., wrote in a letter to The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund. A year ago her 8-year-old son was suffering from a paralysis that had been diagnosed as a symptom of a ter...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''This year we are celebrating life,'' Denise Tredwell of Brewster, N.Y., wrote in a letter to The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund. A year ago her 8-year-old son was suffering from a paralysis that had been diagnosed as a symptom of a terminal form of cancer. Now he is regaining his strength and spirit and using a walker, she wrote, sending a donation of $100 ''to brighten the life of a small child.

headline.main: Donors to Neediest Cases Fund Celebrate Their Good Fortune

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: NEW YORK TIMES NEEDIEST CASES FUND

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Nicaraguan guerrilla leaders are becoming impatient with the uncertainty of United States policy toward Central America and say they tried unsuccessfully to arrange meetings with top officials of the Bush Administration to discuss their future.

byline.original: By ROBERT PEAR, Special to the New York Times

docs.snippet: LEAD: The Metropolitan Opera's new ''Salome'' is a schizoid affair. In this Nikolaus Lehnhoff production, the musical and theatrical elements of Strauss's biblical horror story lead parallel lives, never really making contact. Fortunately for thos...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Metropolitan Opera's new ''Salome'' is a schizoid affair. In this Nikolaus Lehnhoff production, the musical and theatrical elements of Strauss's biblical horror story lead parallel lives, never really making contact. Fortunately for those who care about such things, the score's exhausting musical challenges were met triumphantly on Monday evening, particularly by Eva Marton in the grueling title part.

docs.snippet: LEAD: Salvadoran guerrilla leaders said today that they would lay down their arms permanently and ''incorporate ourselves into the nation's political life'' if the Salvadoran Government made fundamental changes in the military apparatus....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Salvadoran guerrilla leaders said today that they would lay down their arms permanently and ''incorporate ourselves into the nation's political life'' if the Salvadoran Government made fundamental changes in the military apparatus.

headline.main: SALVADOR REBELS OFFER TO DISARM IF ARMY IS CURBED
